intro: Psychotria rufescens, commonly known as the red-bark psychotria, is a flowering plant native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. Its fruit is a small, round berry that turns red when mature.
